nodes.text: A Toss of the Dice: This Gambler's Life

A Toss of the Dice: This Gambler's Life was a memoir written by Lando Calrissian. In it, he described his experiences being taken to the center of Rafa V after entering a Sharu pyramid, and being shown the complete history of the Sharu, from their origins as single-celled organisms to their state at the time of his journey. He also speculated in this memoir that the historical gallery might have still existed.
